title: Ulaire Toldea, Messenger of Morgul (1R236)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	6
Card Type:	Minion • Nazgul
Strength:	12
Vitality:	3
Site:	3
Game Text:	Fierce. Assignment: Spot 4 burdens to assign a companion (except the Ring-bearer) to skirmish Ulaire Toldea.
Lore:	”'Open, in the name of Mordor!' said a voice thin and menacing.”
Rarity:	R
